When an enemy's [[HP]] decreases to a certain threshold, it will drop Energy particles or orbs. The HP thresholds and drops vary across different enemies, and one enemy may have up to 4 such thresholds.

Note that if a threshold has already been reached, and the enemy is [[heal]]ed over that threshold, reaching this threshold again will ''not'' drop Energy.

==Energy Generated by Enemy HP Drop==
'''Note:'''
* "Elemental" Particles or Orbs will match the enemy's primary elemental type unless otherwise noted.
* [[Weekly Boss]]es do not drop orbs at fixed HP thresholds.
